ch0091_01_shirona/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You’re looking well today.
ch0091_01_shirona/0101_0701_02_10:
Good battles come easy when you’re feeling good
yourself. Keep up the enthusiasm!
ch0091_01_shirona/0601_0701_01_10:
When I received this sygna suit, the designer told
me to only wear it in battles where I need to go
all out.
ch0091_01_shirona/0601_0701_02_10:
But I always go all out in every battle. I’m not so
clever that I’d hold back against my opponents.
ch0091_01_shirona/0601_0701_03_10:
Even so, I wear this outfit as a reminder of my
determination to never lose, no matter what.
ch0091_01_shirona/0601_0701_04_10: Was that too grandiose of me just now?
ch0091_01_shirona/0602_0701_01_10: Kommo-o likes when I wear this outfit.
ch0091_01_shirona/0602_0701_02_10:
Its design was inspired by Kommo-o, so he
probably feels a strong affinity toward it.
ch0091_01_shirona/0602_0701_03_10:
The decorations on my waist and in my hair were
designed to resemble his scales.
ch0091_01_shirona/0603_0701_01_10:
Back when Kommo-o was still Jangmo-o, he
would challenge Garchomp almost every day.
ch0091_01_shirona/0603_0701_02_10:
Jangmo-o usually fight among themselves to grow
stronger. In that regard, I guess he saw Garchomp
as a substitute.
ch0091_01_shirona/0603_0701_03_10:
But the difference in their strength was very
obvious. He would lose over and over, but he
always got back up to fight again.
ch0091_01_shirona/0603_0701_04_10:
He’s a gutsy one. I could learn a thing or two
from him.
ch0091_01_shirona/0604_0701_01_10:
The moment a Pokémon evolves is a truly moving
experience for me, no matter how many times I
witness it.
ch0091_01_shirona/0604_0701_02_10:
It’s a very important milestone in that Pokémon’s
life—one it will remember forever.
ch0091_01_shirona/0604_0701_03_10:
As a Trainer, nothing makes me happier than
being witness to that.
ch0091_01_shirona/0605_0701_01_10:
Do you have dreams or goals,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0091_01_shirona/0605_0701_02_10:
If not, you should set one—even a small one will
surely make each day enjoyable.
ch0091_01_shirona/0605_0701_03_10:
Having a dream or goal will reinvigorate you.
It makes you want to work that much harder.
ch0091_01_shirona/1701_0701_01_10:
I found something interesting I’d like to give
to you.
ch0091_01_shirona/1701_0702_01_10:
I found that while I was tidying up my room.
Thank you for taking it off my hands.
ch0091_01_shirona/1701_0702_02_10:
I’m honestly not very good at being organized.
I’m sure there’s plenty more where that came
from, so I’ll give you whatever else I find!
ch0091_01_shirona/2501_0701_01_10:
I’m celebrated as a Champion, but I see that
accomplishment as just one stop of my journey.
ch0091_01_shirona/2501_0701_02_10:
That’s not enough to satisfy me. I want to go
even further.
ch0091_01_shirona/2501_0701_03_10:
Kommo-o and I are aiming for the top. We can’t
afford to stop for even a moment.
ch0091_01_shirona/2501_0702_01_10:
Coming to Pasio reminded me once again just how
vast the world is.
ch0091_01_shirona/2501_0702_02_10:
And there’s so much in this world that’s still
unknown to me. Trainers I’ve never met, Pokémon
I’ve never seen before...
ch0091_01_shirona/2501_0702_03_10:
By coming here, I’ve caught a glimpse of what’s
out there, waiting to be discovered. I wouldn’t
trade that experience for anything.
ch0091_01_shirona/2511_0701_01_10:
Champions and members of the Elite Four from all
over the world have assembled here on Pasio.
ch0091_01_shirona/2511_0701_02_10:
I love it. There are so many opponents here for
me to battle without holding anything back.
ch0091_01_shirona/2511_0701_03_10:
I’m going to climb the ranks here like any
other Trainer!
ch0091_01_shirona/2511_0702_01_10:
But I’m also keeping my eye on you as much as
I am the Champions that are here.
ch0091_01_shirona/2511_0702_02_10:
You see, whenever a major historical shift occurs,
young people of conviction are said to always be
at the heart of it.
ch0091_01_shirona/2511_0702_03_10:
I have a hunch that you may become one of those
young people.
ch0091_01_shirona/3001_0701_01_10:
I fell asleep doing research again last night.
Make sure you have better sleep habits than
I do, all right?
ch0091_01_shirona/3004_0701_01_10:
They say procrastination is the thief of time...
If I don’t get things done while it’s light out,
they often don’t get done at all.
ch0091_01_shirona/3005_0701_01_10:
In daylight, we depend on our eyes...but at night,
our ears help us discover all sorts of new and
wonderful things.
